battle_start: Oh ho! Let’s see if you’re worth my bro’s time!
You’re shark chum! Let’s mix it up!
battle_lost: Muwahaha! Lost, but I ain’t sunk yet!
Oh ho! My bro Archie’ll finish what I started!
battle_won: Oh ho! Crushed like a tin-can submarine!
That’s how Team Aqua rolls, punk!
done_looser: Oh ho! The sea’s still rising, kid!
My bro’s vision’s bigger than your petty wins!
done_winner: Oh ho! Another barnacle scraped off!
Don’t cry—the ocean’s got room for your tears!
